games.title: Rise of the Dead
games.description: Dive into the intense universe of Rise of the Dead, a post-apocalyptic city filled with undead. As a brave survivor, your goal is to reclaim territories, eliminate zombies, and rescue others. Enjoy this free online game on your phone or computer, testing your strategy and combat abilities.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:  
    Movement:  Arrow keys (W A S D)  
    Shoot:  left click 
    Reload:  R  
    Punch:  E
    Change weapon: Q
    Use prop 1:  G
    Use prop 2: F
    Zoom: Scrollbar

Mobile Controls:  
    Movement:  Virtual Joystick [Joystick Image]  
    Actions:  Tap corresponding buttons

games.title: Zombie Space Episode II
games.description:
NEW ISSUE OF GALACTIC NEWS

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE ON THE RED PLANET...
- Zombie virus has spread among civilians.
- Rescuers found survivors among the zombies.
- The galactic government has urgently gone on vacation.

★★★
A zombie virus outbreak has occurred on the space station. The first group of mercenaries disappeared. Your task is to find survivors among the zombies and find out the cause of the zombie apocalypse. You have to fight a horde of zombies using various types of weapons. Look for hidden weapons in chests. Upgrade characters and weapons! Use the abilities of the characters in hot battles against zombies. Play with a friend on the same device or solo!
★★★

games.title: Abandoned Mansion
games.description:
Abandoned Mansion is a first-person horror game set in an abandoned mansion, where a distress call leads you to investigate. Upon arrival, you realize it’s too late.
The game features item interaction, challenging puzzles, and terrifying monsters.

Features:

Optimized 3D graphics and realistic sound effects
Immersive and thrilling music
Multiple levels to test your skills
Variety of enemy types
Boss fights
Puzzles to solve
Exploration of the abandoned building
Hidden rooms and items
"Abandoned Mansion" will test your courage and survival skills. Can you unravel the mansion's mystery and face its monstrous inhabitants? Play now to find out.
games.howToPlayText:
W, A, S, D - Move
E - Interact
R - Reload
C - Crouch
Tab - Open inventory
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Attack/Shoot

games.title: Pulse Of Fear
games.description:
Trapped in an abandoned place where something unspeakable lives, your survival depends on two things: light and silence.

Fuel your flashlight with batteries to shed light on the eerie secrets of the place. Repair generators to restore power and find a way to escape. Search for items: fuses for electrical panels, first aid kits for healing, and keys to locked doors.

Light the way. Fix the system. Start the elevator. Most importantly, stay in the shadows.
games.howToPlayText:
Search generators, activate they. Change fuse, Cut wires and more. Hide from monsters - use beds or lockers
Desktop controls:
Movement: WASD
Look: Mouse
Run: Shift
Action: E
Flashlight: F
Pause: Tab
Drop Item: Q
Inventory: 1,2,3,4,5

Mobile Controls:
Movement: Joystick on Screen
Look: Touch Zone
Run button: Press for run
Action button: Tap for use 
Flashlight button: Activate Flashlight
Pause: Button for pause game
Drop Button: Drop item
Inventory: Change Items

games.title: Locked in Grandma’s Basement 2: Revenge - Horror Escape
games.description:
Locked in Grandma’s Basement 2: Revenge – Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again — and this time, she’s locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.
Explore eerie rooms, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover cursed objects and grotesque clues.
Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story — and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
games.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don’t move around freely — instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.
Click on objects to examine them, collect useful items, and use them in the right places to solve puzzles and progress through the story.
Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

games.title: Nubik in the Monster World!
games.description:
Nubik saved the kittens and defeated all the monsters! But it wasn’t over yet - the monsters came back!
The evil Huggy has kidnapped all the kittens again!

But this time, Nubik got himself a whole arsenal of new weapons! In the game, you'll find an AK-47, an M16 rifle, a grenade launcher, a machine gun, and two powerful shotguns!

Help Nubik find the kittens to earn a million coins! Search for and open loot chests. Upgrade your character and blow up TNT blocks! Also, Nubik’s friend often gets captured by monsters and thrown behind bars. Help Nubik escape from prison!
games.howToPlayText:
In the settings menu, you can enable the auto-shoot feature — it's especially convenient when playing on a phone. You can also adjust mouse sensitivity for PC or swipe sensitivity for mobile in the main menu. The radar will help you easily navigate through the level!
Controls:
For PC:
Mouse – rotate the camera
Tab or Esc – pause
WASD – move
Left mouse button – shoot
F or E – interact

For mobile:
Swipe on the screen to rotate the camera
Joystick – move
Tap quickly on the screen – shoot

games.title: Same Room Same Day
games.description: Experience the thrilling psychological horror of "Same Room Same Day." As Rosaline, explore a terrifying building filled with monstrous beings. Face intense challenges, collect crucial supplies, and confront your deepest fears to uncover secrets and seek tranquility in a frightening digital landscape.
games.howToPlayText:
Full Gamepad support required 

Controls: 
Move: WASD
Look Around: Mouse
Shoot: Left Click
Aim: Right Click
Reload: R
Flashlight: F
Jump: Space
Interact: E
Sprint: Shift

games.title: Patagonians
games.description: Explore horror and mystery in Patagonians! Search for your missing daughter, battle monsters, solve puzzles, and survive deadly traps in eerie caves and mansions. Dare to face the darkness? Play now!
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard 
WASD - move the character, SPACE - jump, SHIFT - run, E - action, LMB - attack, RMB - secondary weapon, TAB - pause.
Slide down- S or Down arrow key 
Mobile 
Screen buttons.

games.title: Halloween Stickman 2
games.description: Halloween Stickman 2 offers an exhilarating gaming experience where you navigate a mischievous, spooky environment. Play online for free and dive into a Halloween-themed adventure as you outsmart your trickster friend, Stickman, to seek revenge amidst the festive chaos.
games.howToPlayText:
Use a computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or a finger.
It is necessary to watch the story animation and choose a way to punish the Stickman. You need to click on the buttons to see all the punishments of the Stickman.

games.title: Halloween Stickman
games.description: Halloween Stickman is an exciting adventure game where you can exact revenge on your tricky friend by rewinding time. Set in a spooky atmosphere, experience a captivating story with your choices influencing the outcome. Play for free on any device, and immerse yourself in this thrilling 2D horror journey.
games.howToPlayText:
Use a computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or a finger.
It is necessary to watch the story animation and choose a way to punish the Stickman. You need to click on the buttons to see all the punishments of the Stickman.

games.title: Creepy playtime
games.description: Enter the unsettling realm of Creepy Playtime, where shadows hide lurking threats. Collect soda cans while avoiding detection in this suspenseful game. A haunting voice taunts your every step. Can you escape the monsters, or will they ensnare you? Play this frightening adventure for free online on PC and mobile.
games.howToPlayText:
You woke up backstage, filled with monsters and mysteries! The locals do not like uninvited guests, so its better not to get caught by them. To get out of the backstage, you need to collect soda cans scattered throughout the backstage. But be careful, the monsters behind the scenes are very vigilant! Can you get out? If not, then you will stay there forever!

Controls on PC:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space

Controls on smartphone:
Movement - Left joystick
Turns - Right joystick
Jump - Button
